data.title: Oconee Fall Line Technical College Virtual Tour
data.meta_description: Get a feel for the campus by taking the Oconee Fall Line Technical College virtual tour and viewing maps of the campus.
data.text:
Are You Applying to Oconee Fall Line Technical College? Explore the Campus Using the Virtual Tour Below.

Virtual tours are a great way to refresh your memory or to preview an on-site tour of OFTC.

Do I Really Need to Take a Tour?

At the beginning of your college search, a virtual tour can be a beneficial tool to explore the campus before your visit. When you do visit the campus, be sure to talk to current students about their experiences. A student perspective is a helpful way to gauge your future experience when attending Oconee Fall Line Technical College. Already took an on-campus tour? It's inevitable. All of your college tours will blend, and you might forget the appearance of OFTC's library, dorms, or cafeteria. Use the virtual tour to jog your memory! With the interactive mapping tool below you can even explore the area surrounding the campus.

Virtual Tour

Use the resources below to start your virtual tour.
